metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0427 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In create_pinctrl of core.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due toa use after free. This could lead to local information disclosure with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-140550171

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
